note:
I am a retired Physicist living in Teddington, West London. In my retirement I have devoted a lot of time and money with the aim of minimising my carbon dioxide emissions.

In my professional life I was specialist in the measurement of temperature at the UK's National Physical Laboratory from 2000 to 2020.

Prior to that I was lecturer at Birkbeck College and University College specialising is low temperature condensed matter physics.
